segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is methodically wiping down the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window reveals a serene garden beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, the faucet pours water without stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling the sink to the brim and beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow hits the floor in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet, yet she remains engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a child perches on an unsteady stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He extends toward the open cookie cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One arm in the jar, the other clutching a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The young girl assists by reaching up eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The composition highlights domestic life with hidden risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
